liveHLS.name: 720p
liveHLS.cmd: %FFMPEG% -re -dual_mono_mode main -i pipe:0 -sn -threads 0 -map 0 -ignore_unknown -max_muxing_queue_size 1024 -f hls -hls_time 3 -hls_list_size 17 -hls_allow_cache 1 -hls_segment_filename %streamFileDir%/stream%streamNum%-%09d.ts -c:a aac -ar 48000 -b:a 192k -ac 2 -c:v nvenc -vf bwdif=0:-1:0,scale=-2:720 -b:v 5000k -preset fast -flags +loop-global_header %OUTPUT%

liveHLS.name: 480p
liveHLS.cmd: %FFMPEG% -re -dual_mono_mode main -i pipe:0 -sn -threads 0 -map 0 -ignore_unknown -max_muxing_queue_size 1024 -f hls -hls_time 3 -hls_list_size 17 -hls_allow_cache 1 -hls_segment_filename %streamFileDir%/stream%streamNum%-%09d.ts -c:a aac -ar 48000 -b:a 128k -ac 2 -c:v nvenc -vf bwdif=0:-1:0,scale=-2:480 -b:v 2500k -preset fast -flags +loop-global_header %OUTPUT%

recordedHLS.name: 720p 5Mbps
recordedHLS.cmd: %FFMPEG% -dual_mono_mode main -i %INPUT% -sn -threads 0 -map 0 -ignore_unknown -max_muxing_queue_size 1024 -f hls -hls_time 3 -hls_list_size 0 -hls_allow_cache 1 -hls_segment_filename %streamFileDir%/stream%streamNum%-%09d.ts -c:a aac -ar 48000 -b:a 192k -ac 2 -c:v nvenc -vf bwdif=0:-1:0,scale=-2:720 -b:v 5000k -preset veryfast -flags +loop-global_header %OUTPUT%

recordedHLS.name: 480p 2.5Mbps
recordedHLS.cmd: %FFMPEG% -dual_mono_mode main -i %INPUT% -sn -threads 0 -map 0 -ignore_unknown -max_muxing_queue_size 1024 -f hls -hls_time 3 -hls_list_size 0 -hls_allow_cache 1 -hls_segment_filename %streamFileDir%/stream%streamNum%-%09d.ts -c:a aac -ar 48000 -b:a 128k -ac 2 -c:v nvenc -vf bwdif=0:-1:0,scale=-2:480 -b:v 2500k -preset veryfast -flags +loop-global_header %OUTPUT%
